00058 #ifdef PTHREAD_RWLOCK_INITIALIZER
00059 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_INITIALIZER PTHREAD_RWLOCK_INITIALIZER
00060 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_RDLOCK(l) pthread_rwlock_rdlock(l)
00061 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_WRLOCK(l) pthread_rwlock_wrlock(l)
00062 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(l) pthread_rwlock_unlock(l)
00063 #define DFSCH_CREATE_RWLOCK dfsch_create_finalized_rwlock
00064 #define DFSCH_INIT_RWLOCK(l) pthread_rwlock_init(l, NULL)
00065 #define DFSCH_DESTROY_RWLOCK(l) pthread_rwlock_destroy(l)
00066 typedef pthread_rwlock_t dfsch_rwlock_t;
00067 #else
00068 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_INITIALIZER PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER
00069 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_RDLOCK(l) pthread_mutex_lock(l)
00070 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_WRLOCK(l) pthread_mutex_lock(l)
00071 #define DFSCH_RWLOCK_UNLOCK(l) pthread_mutex_unlock(l)
00072 #define DFSCH_CREATE_RWLOCK dfsch_create_finalized_mutex
00073 #define DFSCH_INIT_RWLOCK(l) pthread_mutex_init(l, NULL)
00074 #define DFSCH_DESTROY_RWLOCK(l) pthread_mutex_destroy(l)
00075 typedef pthread_mutex_t dfsch_rwlock_t;
00076 #endif
